name: Puck the Pangolin
description:
Explore the island as Puck the Pangolin. 

Travel across the island while collecting gems, orbs and data disks. Unlock new levels, discover secret exits and find those disks to unlock new skins. 

Puck the Pangolin features:

  • 8 exciting levels - Journey from the beaches, up the mountain and all the way to Cyber city itself
  • Retro World Map - Levels open up as you progress towards Cyber City, secret paths give access to bonus levels
  • Platforming action - Dodge bots, grab gems and raise your score
  • Secrets galore - Find Orbs for a massive point boost 
  • Unlockable skins - Outfit Puck with 13 skins gained by exploring the levels and collecting secret data disks 
  • Controller and Keyboard Support
  • Save game system - Keep your high scores, outfits and unlocked levels saved for next time

Made over 72 hours for the Lost Cart Jam 2021. *

*I ran out of time to get the levels fully populated with assets, but they are all completable
